edu.stanford.pigir.webbase

Class WbRecordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.pigir.webbase.WbRecordFactory

  • public class WbRecordFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Mint a new WbRecord subclass, depending on the content-type of the passed-in Web content. We explicitly recognize text, audio, and images. If the content-type field is missing, or if its value is not recognized, we return a WbDefaultRecord. If the Web content does not even have a header, we return null from the constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getWbRecord

        public static WbRecord getWbRecord(Metadata md,
                   byte[] page)
        Parameters:
        md - The WebBase metadata header before each page's HTTP header
        page - The Web content
        Returns:
        a WbRecord subclass as described in class comment, or null if the Web content does not have an identifiable HTTP header.
